name: TRANSIT (Sanabius)
description:
Transit 2 is the moon of the planet Sanabius and contains avatar capsules for traveling to other worlds.

Before embarking on a journey to some world, the scanner will check what feelings the future traveler has.

And depending on the feelings that this person has, he will be sent to the appropriate planet.

While on the moon of Transit 2, you can accumulate different feelings in order to get into the world that you like more than others.
